Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class GameModelExpert

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.GameModelExpert
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageListenerSubscriber, EffectHandler, Game, ProfessorChecker
public class GameModelExpert extends Object implements Game, EffectHandler, ProfessorChecker
Changes mode of the Game to expert mode. Composite pattern.

    • moveStudentToHall

      public boolean moveStudentToHall(int entranceIndex)
      Moves a student from the Entrance to the Hall of the current player if the player is not activating a card. If the student was added in a "coin space" of the hall and there are enough coins in the reserve then one coin is given to the player. Notifies the listeners.
      Specified by:
      moveStudentToHall in interface Game
      Parameters:
      entranceIndex - of the student that will be moved to the Hall.
      Returns:
      if the student was successfully moved to the hall.

    • moveStudentToIsland

      public boolean moveStudentToIsland(int entranceIndex, int islandGroupIndex)
      Selects a student from the Entrance of the current Player's SchoolBoard, removes it from there and moves it to a selected island that is part of a selected IslandGroup only if the player is not activating a card. Notifies the listeners.
      Specified by:
      moveStudentToIsland in interface Game
      Parameters:
      entranceIndex - of the slot occupied by the student that will be moved.
      islandGroupIndex - of the IslandGroup that contains the selected island.
      Returns:
      if the student was moved successfully.

    • moveMotherNature

      public boolean moveMotherNature(int num)
      Moves mother nature by num + additional movement if the player is not activating a card. If there are no clouds with students it skips the "choose cloud" phase. Notifies the listeners.
      Specified by:
      moveMotherNature in interface Game
      Parameters:
      num - of moves that MotherNature should make.
      Returns:
      if the move ended successfully.

      public void tryRemoveStudentsFromHalls(StudentColor s, int idealAmount)
